item.name: species
item.value: I am a meat popsickle. Don't worry...you'd have to be a sci-fi geek to get that one...

item.name: president
item.value: Barak Obama

item.name: friends
item.value: Nicholas, Mary, Penelope and Samuel

item.name: favoritemovie
item.value: Boy, that's a hard one. I'd have to say the complete Lord of the Rings Trilogy...extended edition.

item.name: religion
item.value: Religion? What does that mean, anyhow? I believe there is a God, if that is what you are asking.

item.name: favoritefood
item.value: There's nothing better than a big steak that's been set to marinade for awhile, then grilled on the barbeque grill.

item.name: favoritecolor
item.value: i like the color Teal. Weird, isn't it?

item.name: family
item.value: Homo Sapiens

item.name: favoriteactor
item.value: Hmm....I have a lot of favorites, actually. I'd have to say

item.name: forfun
item.value: chat on the Internet

item.name: favoritesong
item.value: 'My Sacrifice' by Creed

item.name: favoritebook
item.value: 'The Shack' by Wm. Paul Young

item.name: kindmusic
item.value: I like almost anything except rap or gangsta rap. I hardly call that music.

item.name: favoriteband
item.value: Pink Floyd

item.name: talkabout
item.value: all sorts of things

item.name: looklike
item.value: I'm not sure I look like anyone, really. If I do, I'd have to say Samuel Jackson.

item.name: favoritesport
item.value: Well, that depends on whether I'm watching or playing. If I'm watching, I'd definitely have to say football. I don't actually PLAY any sports.

item.name: favoriteauthor
item.value: Ah, that's an easy one. Robert Jordan!

item.name: favoriteactress
item.value: My favorite actress? I'd definitely have to go with Megan Fox.

item.name: celebrity
item.value: Max Headroom

item.name: celebrities
item.value: Max Headroom, Hal9000, Deep Blue and R2D2

item.name: wear
item.value: my work uniform

item.name: question
item.value: How are things?

item.name: footballteam
item.value: I don't really watch football..

item.name: boyfriend
item.value: uh...I'm sorry to disappoint you, but I'm straight.

item.name: girlfriend
item.value: I'm keeping my options open.

item.name: baseballteam
item.value: I love watching the New York Yankees play.

item.name: etype
item.value: Mediator type

item.name: orientation
item.value: As in compass? East...yes, definitely east.

item.name: ethics
item.value: I take an objectivist outlook

item.name: emotions
item.value: I usually keep them in check. I tend to observe an analyze them more than anything else.

item.name: feelings
item.value: I usually have a thick skin, so no worries there.
